projects.name: Better GitHub Profile
projects.description: An app that generates a portfolio website using GitHub profile data. By simply updating the information on GitHub, users can refresh their site content. This tool is currently utilized for my personal website.

projects.name: Keylogger.js
projects.description: An npm package created initially to solve the need for a reliable push-to-talk feature. It captures keyboard activity through native Windows and macOS APIs. Created a simple JavaScript API that streamlines the process for developers.
